item.title: That Plug Packs a Punch: Hydraulic Oil Spill
item.description: Watch as a stubborn plug causes a hydraulic oil spill, creating a messy situation and showing the importance of safety and proper handling on machinery.

item.title: This Problem Caused Big Trouble
item.description: A small issue escalates into a major problem, showing how it unfolded, the challenges faced, and the lessons learned from the situation.

item.title: Hauling Corn and Checking Weights
item.description: Join us as we haul corn from the field and check weights, demonstrating proper handling, measurement, and tips for an efficient harvest process.

item.title: The Aftermath of the Big Storm
item.description: See the impact of the big storm as we assess damage, cleanup, and recovery, highlighting the challenges and resilience in the wake of severe weather.

item.title: Deere vs Case 4-Track Comparison
item.description: We share our insights comparing Deere and Case 4-track tractors, covering performance, handling, and features to help farmers make informed equipment choices.

item.description: Watch the process of working rich black soil on the farm, showcasing plowing, planting, and preparing the land for a productive growing season.

item.title: The 2096 Tractor Frozen to the Ground
item.description: Watch as we deal with a 2096 tractor stuck in frozen ground, showing the challenges and techniques used to free it and keep farm operations moving.

item.title: Combine Wash Disaster: Nothing Worked
item.description: A frustrating day on the farm as our combine wash didn’t go as planned, highlighting the challenges and mishaps that can happen during equipment cleaning.
